<Text: I.O.U.S.A.:  The film focuses on the shape and impact of the United States national debt.>
Triplets:<I.O.U.S.A.
2:
--------------------
Text: I.O.U.S.A.:  The film features Robert Bixby, director of the Concord Coalition, and David Walker, the former U.S. Comptroller-General, as they travel around the United States on a tour to let communities know of the potential dangers of the national debt.
Triplets:<Robert Bixby
3:
--------------------
Text: I.O.U.S.A.:  The tour was carried out through the Concord Coalition, and was known as the "Fiscal Wake-Up Tour."
Triplets:<I.O.U.S.A.
